ygData.subject: Re: Are we Hybrids?
ygData.msgSnippet: IMO Bards are a hybird of Rogue/Enchanter/Shamen :) ... ______________________________________________________ Get Your Private, Free Email at
ygData.messageBody:
IMO Bards are a hybird of Rogue/Enchanter/Shamen :)


>From: Mike.Langlois@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Are we Hybrids?
>Date: Mon, 17 Jan 2000 17:08:46 -0600
>
>
>
>I agree completely. If you mean hybrid in the generic sense. I mean
>Hybrid as
>a proper noun, being a specific thing in EQ terms.
>
>That is, a fighter/caster mix. In EQ, Hybrid means part Warrior Class and
>part
>Druid/Cleric/Necro.
>
>In that sense, I say we aren't. We have the caster, just not the fighter.
>
>
>I promise not to beat this one again either :)
>
>Golias, Sol Ro
>----------------------
>
>
>
>
>
>From: Valharick@...
>
>IMO bards are the ultimate hybrid (not saying we are the best) just that we
>are a mixture of each class. We can do a bit of everything that any class
>can
>do.
>
>Ren
>
>
